product_name: SPRI Hot And Cold Foot Roller
long_description: This unique foot massage roller fits into the arch of your foot, offering stimulation to relax muscles and ease tension. The raised surface dots provide a kneading effect for extra relief.
short_description: This unique foot massage roller fits into the arch of your foot, offering stimulation to relax muscles and ease tension. The raised surface dots provide a kneading effect for extra relief.
